message: I'd like to add a reverse generic relationship to a model in a third-party app (let's say django.contrib.comments). If I subclass a proxy model from Comment and add `spam_reports = GenericRelation(SpamReport)`, I get `FieldError: Proxy model 'CommentProxy' contains model fields.`

@akaihola A Proxy model doesn't hold any model definition, but are a way to "filter" model content. To extend a model there is two ways : multi-table inheritance or concrete model based on abstract ones.
